oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Laying hen husbandry: group size and use of hen-runs
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hirt, Helen
Hördegen, Philipp
Zeltner, Esther
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Poultry
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: With regard to welfare reasons, various label productions limit the number of laying hens allowed per flock. The question arose whether the group size has an influence on the use of laying hen runs.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Hirt, Helen; Hördegen, Philipp and Zeltner, Esther (2000) Laying hen husbandry: group size and use of hen-runs. Paper at: International IFOAM Scientific Conference, Basel, 28 to 31 August 2000. [Unpublished]
